name: Kurushi Final: Mental Blocks
overview: Bringing a new meaning to the phrase 'mental block', "Kurushi Final: Mental Blocks" dares you to test your intelligence against a higher power, 9 mind-stretching stages, plus 2-player survival mode, 100 additional challenges and a custom-puzzle generator, "Kurushi Final: Mental Blocks" is a supreme test of mental and physical agility.
